import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import UserBrief from '../common_components/user_brief.component' import Map from '../common_components/Map' import RequestScreen from "../all_request_list/Request_list.screen" import properties from '../../img/properties.svg' import phone from '../../img/phone-call.svg' import marker from '../../img/marker.svg' import ruble from '../../img/ruble_sign.svg' import crop from '../../img/crop_original.svg' class RequestAnswer extends React.Component { dropDownNameChange(){ let text = document.getElementById('dropDownText') if(document.getElementById('showMore').classList.contains('show')) text.textContent = "Скрыть"; else text.textContent = "Показать больше"; } render() { let show; if (this.props.sub_screen != "0"){ show= ( Показать больше ) } else show=
return (
{items[0].request_title}

{items[0].request_description}

Даты:

{items[0].request_whenDate} - {items[0].request_tillDate}

{items[0].phone}
{items[0].location}
{hideMap}
) } } export default RequestAnswer
